articles.author: Deutsche Welle
articles.title: Elon Musk insults German President Frank-Walter Steinmeier - DW (English)
articles.description: Tesla boss Elon Musk has added German President Frank-Walter Steinmeier to the list of politicians he has insulted in Europe. He also announced a plan to speak to the leader of the country's far-right AfD.
articles.content:
Billionaire Elon Musk on Tuesday extended his record of personal insults against European politicians with a new post taking a swipe at the country's President Frank-Walter Steinmeier.
The comments … [+2163 chars]
